description.narrative: Ghana - Agriculture Project - Commercial Training Activity: the Farmer and Enterprise Training in Commercial Agriculture ("Commercial Training Activity") program will support farmer-based organizations ("FBOs") by providing training in business management, planning and finance practices, market analyses and marketing, customer service and pricing mechanisms. The Commercial Training Activity seeks to strengthen and support both FBOs and certain agribusiness service providers who offer various value-adding services to the FBOs. Specifically, MCC Funding will support the following: (i) Extension activities by the Ministry of Food and Agriculture ("MOFA") and (ii) Commercial training program for FBOs.

condition.narrative: Further details on conditions precedent affecting this activity can be found in the top-level parent activities.

Prior to any MCC Disbursement for the Commercial Training Activity: MiDA has selected and engaged the Commercialization of Agriculture Project Manager, approved by MCC, or in the event the position is vacated, MiDA is actively recruiting for the position.

Prior to any MCC Disbursement, for the Commercial Training Activity covering Quarter 1 of each Year: MiDA has submitted evidence demonstrating that the Government has maintained, at minimum the current fiscal year's level of budget allocation to the Directorate of Extension of MOFA to fund management, staffing and operational cost of extension services in target districts for the upcoming fiscal year.

usg:usg-activity.usg:purpose-statement: Ghana - Agriculture Project - Commercial Training Activity: the Farmer and Enterprise Training in Commercial Agriculture ("Commercial Training Activity") program will support farmer-based organizations ("FBOs") by providing training in business management, planning and finance practices, market analyses and marketing, customer service and pricing mechanisms. The Commercial Training Activity seeks to strengthen and support both FBOs and certain agribusiness service providers who offer various value-adding services to the FBOs. Specifically, MCC Funding will support the following: (i) Extension activities by the Ministry of Food and Agriculture ("MOFA") and (ii) Commercial training program for FBOs.
